room_title: Escape room "Las Vegas" by Exit Artists in Los Angeles
room_description:
With every card dealt and every dice rolled, you and your team of professional card counters take a step closer to your entrepreneurial success story. Inside the largest casino in Las Vegas, your journey takes an unexpected turn when your main spotters are captured by casino security. For the first time in Las Vegas history, the casino is now under lockdown and the security has been given 90 minutes to capture the rest of your team.
You thought you could beat the system? Well, the system is beating you. Will you find your fellow card counters? But most importantly, will you all escape?
